availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Sally Norris Pharis. Father of S.P. Pharis, W. Pharis, Nathan Pharis, and Eliza C. Pharis. Farmer in Cumberland County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Cumberland, p. 292B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 522.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 394A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 31582.
"Samuel Pharis Jr. (1811-1885)," Find A Grave, Memorial 94010714, accessed January X, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94010714.
